WG Cells (DropForge Games) | Lead Platform Engineer | Bellevue/Seattle, WA

WG Cells is the mobile development and publishing arm of Wargaming.net (World of Tanks).

We're looking for a Lead Platform Software Engineer who is passionate about creating scalable, robust, and maintainable server solutions for mobile games using iterative development and other best practices.

Responsibilities: Create efficient and properly-scoped architecture designs; Organize and manage a small team of Platform Engineers; Provide technical guidance and mentorship for other team members

Qualifications: 8+ years of server-side Java or C#; 3+ years of team management; Scalable database design (NoSQL); Asynchronous/multithreaded programming

More details and application information here: https://dropforge.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=26
